description: Defines the 'Note' immutable data model with fields, constructors, and utility methods for database serialization/deserialization and state checking.

classes.name: Note
classes.description: Immutable class representing a note with properties such as id, title, content, creation and update timestamps, and methods for copying, serialization, and state checking.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of the Note instance with selectively replaced fields.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: Factory constructor that creates a Note instance from a database map.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Note instance into a map suitable for database storage.

methods.name: isBlank
methods.description: Checks if both title and content are empty or whitespace.
